mcq_question: What will be the output of the following Python code? x = 50 def func(x):     print('x is', x)     x = 2     print('Changed local x to', x) func(x) print('x is now', x) )
option_a: x is 50 Changed global x to 2 Value of x is 50
option_b: x is 50 Changed global x to 2 Value of x is 2
option_c: x is 50 Changed global x to 50 Value of x is 50
